DataElement.preferredName: Malignant Neoplasm Other Nodal Involvement Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free text field to specify information related to the involvement of a malignant neoplasm involved with or pertaining to a node, any bulge or swelling of an anatomical structure or part, other than those previously mentioned.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to the involvement of a malignant neoplasm involved with or pertaining to a node, any bulge or swelling of an anatomical structure or part, other than those previously mentioned.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A tumor composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invade other tissues.  Malignant neoplasms usually metastasize to distant anatomic sites and may recur after excision.  The most common malignant neoplasms are carcinomas (adenocarcinomas or squamous cell carcinomas), Hodgkin's and non-Hodgkin's lymphomas, leukemias, melanomas, and sarcomas. -- 2004

Concepts.definition: A neoplasm composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invade other tissues. Malignant neoplasms often metastasize to distant anatomic sites and may recur after excision. The most common malignant neoplasms are carcinomas, Hodgkin and non-Hodgkin lymphomas, leukemias, melanomas, and sarcomas.

Property.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:Of or pertaining to a node, any bulge or swelling of an anatomical structure or part.:To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Of or pertaining to a node, any bulge or swelling of an anatomical structure or part.
To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field to specify the assessment performed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.
